Title: Moritz, Dear Moritz
Actors: Michael Kebschull, Kyra Mladeck, Walter Klosterfelde, Elvira Thom
Plot: Moritz is fifteen years old and in the middle of puberty. His parents are in an economic crisis. Although the family still lives in a huge villa in Hamburg, it is only a matter of time to leave there. His grandmother was once a central person in his life, but she was deported to a retirement home by her parents. He remains alone and seeks contact.
